metadata.title: Efficacy and immunogenicity of recombinant swinepox virus expressing the truncated S protein of a novel isolate of porcine epidemic diarrhea virus

abstract.original_text: viruses were identified within neutralizing epitopes, which might have contributed to the divergent clinical results. Our data suggest that rSPV-St is potentially an effective vaccine against infection with emerging PEDV strains.

sentences.segment_text: viruses were identified within neutralizing epitopes ,
which might have contributed to the divergent clinical results .
Our data suggest that rSPV-St is potentially an effective vaccine against infection with emerging PEDV strains .
